Description: Two joining sherds of foot and floor of Attic black-figured pottery cup; broad and low flaring ring foot; part of a stacking ring on floor; interior: in tondo, whirligig of alternating glaze (misfired) and red crescents with incised outlines; glazed around with two added red bands; exterior: rays at base of wall; inside and outside of foot glazed, stand surface reserved; underside reserved with dot and ring at centre and a ring near edge.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1690)
